attributes.action: Save money whilst creating jobs, by reinstating bus conductors.
attributes.additional_details:
Unemployment in London is high. The number of people that do not pay to ride the bendy bus is higher.

This petition suggests the solution to both of these problems. By reinstating bus conductors a great number of good jobs will be created, and will be paid for, at least in part, by the money saved by people actually paying for the bus.

rejection.details: Since the petition makes clear that it specifically relates to London, this is a matter for the Mayor.
